snippet: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel received a two-week extension to form a governing coalition, a situation complicated by an unexpected alliance of two rising political stars.
abstract: Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu receives two-week extension to form governing coalition, situation complicated by unexpected alliance between Yair Lapid and Naftali Bennett, two rising political stars; Lapid and Bennett are intent on preventing Netanyahu's longstanding ultra-Orthodox allies from joining next government.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel received a two-week extension to form a governing coalition, a situation complicated by an unexpected alliance of two rising political stars.

headline.seo: In Israel, Netanyahu Gets Extension to Form Coalition
headline.main: Israeli Premier Gets Extension to Form a Coalition but Faces Turmoil
headline.print_headline: Israeli Premier, Facing Unlikely Alliance, Is Given More Time to Form a Coalition
